languages.text:
Простор Коронус — огромный сектор космоса, где вы можете путешествовать по разным звездным системам. В каждой системе происходят уникальные события: направляя корабль, вы можете исследовать планеты, изучать аномалии и взаимодействовать с другими кораблями.
Чтобы перейти на карту всего Простора, удерживайте {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is a vast region of space where you will travel between different star systems. In each system, unique events can occur. By steering your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} toward them, you can explore planets, study anomalies, and interact with other ships.
To switch to the map of the entire Koronus Expanse, press and hold {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.
languages.original_text:
Простор Коронус — огромный сектор космоса, где вы можете путешествовать по разным звездным системам. В каждой системе происходят уникальные события: направляя корабль, вы можете исследовать планеты, изучать аномалии и взаимодействовать с другими кораблями.
Чтобы перейти на карту всего Простора, удерживайте {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

traits.locale_text:
The Koronus Expanse is a vast region of space where you can travel between different star systems. In each system, unique events can occur. By steering your flagship toward them, you can explore planets, study anomalies, and interact with other ships.
To go to the map of the entire Koronus Expanse, press and hold {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

The Koronus Expanse is a vast region of space where you can travel between different star systems. In each system, unique events can occur. By steering your flagship toward them, you can explore planets, study anomalies, and interact with other ships.
To go to the map of the entire Koronus Expanse, press and hold {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

To switch to the map of the entire Koronus Expanse, press and hold {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is a vast region of space where you will travel between different star systems. In each system, unique events can occur. By steering your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} toward them, you can explore planets, study anomalies, and interact with other ships.
To switch to the map of the entire Koronus Expanse, press and hold {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is a vast region of space where you will travel between different star systems. In each system, unique events can occur. By steering your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} toward them, you can explore planets, study anomalies, and interact with other ships.
To switch to the map of the entire Koronus Expanse, press and hold {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} es una gran región del espacio en la que viajarás entre diferentes sistemas estelares. Se pueden producir sucesos únicos en cada sistema. Al llevar tu {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} hacia ellos, podrás explorar planetas, estudiar anomalías e interactuar con otras naves.
Para pasar al mapa de la Extensión de Koronus entera, pulsa y mantén {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is a vast region of space where you will travel between different star systems. In each system, unique events can occur. By steering your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} toward them, you can explore planets, study anomalies, and interact with other ships.
To switch to the map of the entire Koronus Expanse, press and hold {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

traits.locale_text:
La Extensión de Koronus es una gran región del espacio en la que viajarás entre diferentes sistemas estelares. Se pueden producir sucesos únicos en cada sistema. Al llevar tu {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} hacia ellos, podrás explorar planetas, estudiar anomalías e interactuar con otras naves.
Para pasar al mapa de la Extensión de Koronus entera, pulsa y mantén {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}は、異なる星系を行き来する広大な宇宙空間である。星系ごとに、独自のイベントが開催される。{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}をそこに向けて操舵することで、惑星を探索し、異常を調査し、他の船と交流することができる。
コロヌス・エクスパンス全体のマップに切り替えるには、 {console_bind|FuncAdditional}を長押しする。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is a vast region of space where you will travel between different star systems. In each system, unique events can occur. By steering your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} toward them, you can explore planets, study anomalies, and interact with other ships.
To switch to the map of the entire Koronus Expanse, press and hold {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

traits.locale_text:
コロヌス・エクスパンスは、異なる星系を行き来する広大な宇宙空間である。星系ごとに、独自のイベントが開催される。{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}をそこに向けて操舵することで、惑星を探索し、異常を調査し、他の船と交流することができる。
コロヌス・エクスパンス全体のマップに切り替えるには、 {console_bind|FuncAdditional}を長押しする。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}是一片广袤的区域，您可以在各个不同的星系之间穿梭。每个星系都可以包含独一无二的事件。驾驶您的{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}前往这些星系，您便可以探索行星，研究异象，与其他虚空舰进行互动。
若要切换至整个科罗努斯扩区的全域地图，请按住{console_bind|FuncAdditional}。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is a vast region of space where you will travel between different star systems. In each system, unique events can occur. By steering your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} toward them, you can explore planets, study anomalies, and interact with other ships.
To switch to the map of the entire Koronus Expanse, press and hold {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

traits.locale_text:
科罗努斯扩区是一片广袤的区域，您可以在各个不同的星系之间穿梭。每个星系都可以包含独一无二的事件。驾驶您的{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}前往这些星系，您便可以探索行星，研究异象，与其他虚空舰进行互动。
若要切换至整个科罗努斯扩区的全域地图，请按住{console_bind|FuncAdditional}。

languages.text:
Die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} ist eine riesige Region des Weltraums, in der du zwischen verschiedenen Sternensystemen reisen wirst. In jedem System kann es zu einzigartigen Ereignissen kommen. Indem du dein {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} dorthin steuerst, kannst du Planeten erkunden, Anomalien untersuchen und mit anderen Schiffen interagieren.
Um zur Karte der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung zu wechseln, drücke und halte {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is a vast region of space where you will travel between different star systems. In each system, unique events can occur. By steering your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} toward them, you can explore planets, study anomalies, and interact with other ships.
To switch to the map of the entire Koronus Expanse, press and hold {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

traits.locale_text:
Die Koronus-Ausdehnung ist eine riesige Region des Weltraums, in der du zwischen verschiedenen Sternensystemen reisen wirst. In jedem System kann es zu einzigartigen Ereignissen kommen. Indem du dein {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} dorthin steuerst, kannst du Planeten erkunden, Anomalien untersuchen und mit anderen Schiffen interagieren.
Um zur Karte der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung zu wechseln, drücke und halte {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

languages.text:
Les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} forment une vaste région de l'espace où vous voyagerez entre différents systèmes stellaires. Dans chaque système, des événements uniques peuvent se produire. En y envoyant votre {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}, vous pourrez explorer des planètes, étudier des anomalies et interagir avec d'autres vaisseaux.
Pour activer la carte des Étendues de Koronus, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is a vast region of space where you will travel between different star systems. In each system, unique events can occur. By steering your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} toward them, you can explore planets, study anomalies, and interact with other ships.
To switch to the map of the entire Koronus Expanse, press and hold {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

traits.locale_text:
Les Étendues de Koronus forment une vaste région de l'espace où vous voyagerez entre différents systèmes stellaires. Dans chaque système, des événements uniques peuvent se produire. En y envoyant votre {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}, vous pourrez explorer des planètes, étudier des anomalies et interagir avec d'autres vaisseaux.
Pour activer la carte des Étendues de Koronus, appuyez longuement sur {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}, farklı yıldız sistemleri arasında yolculuk edebileceğin geniş bir uzay bölgesidir. Her sistemde eşsiz olaylar meydana gelebilir. {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak geminin{/g} dümenini onlara doğru kırarak gezegenler keşfedebilir, anomalileri araştırabilir ve diğer gemilerle etkileşime girebilirsin.
Koronus Enginliği'nin tümünü gösteren haritaya geçmek için, {console_bind|FuncAdditional} düğmesini basılı tut.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} is a vast region of space where you will travel between different star systems. In each system, unique events can occur. By steering your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} toward them, you can explore planets, study anomalies, and interact with other ships.
To switch to the map of the entire Koronus Expanse, press and hold {console_bind|FuncAdditional}.
